overview_of_class:
Chemistry laboratory techniques applied to biosensor technology using concepts of acid-base chemistry, kinetics, and the like. Design of a biosensor. Planning, data collection, interpretation, and reporting on experiments.

Chemistry 123-0 is the laboratory course associated with Chemistry 103-0.
name: General Physical Chemistry Laboratory
title: WCAS CHEM 123-0-33 General Physical Chemistry Laboratory
enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Co-Requisite: Students must also register for Chemistry 103-0.
Add both classes to the shopping cart and submit together for successful registration.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Chemistry laboratory techniques applied to biosensor technology using concepts of acid-base chemistry, kinetics, and the like. Design of a biosensor. Planning, data collection, interpretation, and reporting on experiments.

Chemistry 123-0 is the laboratory course associated with Chemistry 103-0.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
Prerequisite: Grade of C- or better in Chemistry 102-0 and Chemistry 122-0.

Students enrolled in this course MUST also enroll in the associated laboratory course, Chem 123-0.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
1. Electronic Lab Notebook (details to be provided on or before first day of class) ($30)

2. Approved laboratory safety eyewear ($10)

3. 100% Cotton laboratory coat ($45)

Items 2 and 3 will be sold during the first week of classes. Details TBA.

subject: CHEM
